name: Quasit
description: A small, imp-like creature with the ability to shapechange into a bat, rat, or spider, known for its cruel demeanor.
memorable: Its ability to turn invisible and deliver a poisonous scratch makes it a tricky adversary in combat.
goals: Typically serves more powerful demons or evil spellcasters as a spy or familiar.
relations: Often encounters more powerful demons and serves warlocks or chaotic evil masters.
environment: Commonly found in the Abyss or with evil spellcasters.
strengths: Highly dexterous and resistant to many forms of damage, including poison and nonmagical attacks.
weaknesses: Physically weak with low hit points and poor strength, vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Uses claws to attack, dealing piercing damage and potentially poisoning targets.
most_powerful_ability: Invisibility allows it to avoid detection and execute surprise attacks.
senses: Has darkvision, enabling it to see in darkness, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing it to hide effectively from enemies.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on spell saving throws.
Ability to frighten nearby creatures with its Scare ability.
Can shapeshift into various small beasts for versatility.
Enjoys causing chaos and mischief in its surroundings.
test_queries: mischievous tiny demon that can turn invisible
fiend that serves evil masters and causes chaos
stealthy imp-like creature with fright abilities
small demon that can transform into a bat
